data.comment: The match is underway in Luton.
Brentford take a 0-1 lead thanks to Rico Henry.
In the minute 29, Great finish from Ivan Toney to give Brentford a 0-2 lead.
The home team replace Matty Pearson with Kazenga LuaLua.
The whistle has gone to end the first-half.
In the minute 46, The second-half is now underway.
Nathan Jones (Luton) is making a second substitution, with Luke Berry replacing Rhys Norrington-Davies.
Danny Hylton for Luton has been booked by Michael Salisbury and receives a first yellow card.
In the minute 74, James Collins is replacing Jordan Clark for Luton at Kenilworth Road.
The away team have replaced Emiliano Marcondes with Mathias Jensen. This is the first substitution made today by Thomas Frank.
Brentford make their second substitution with Marcus Forss replacing Ivan Toney.
In the minute 76, It's now 0-3 in Luton as Marcus Forss scores for Brentford.
Tarique Fosu is on a sub for Bryan Mbeumo for Brentford.
At Kenilworth Road, Vitaly Janelt has been yellow-carded for the away team.
The match is over. Final score 0-3.
